title: New Season's Invisibility -  Addressing Rengar
body:
Make Rengar's R Camo instead of Invis and make his leap range longer.

In the current state that it's in, now that there is no vision ward to counter it, Rengar's R is thoroughly game-breakingly OP. You could even make it Camo + longer leap + no !. But as it is, no. Just no.

I agree that, at the moment, it's just crap and only effective in Bronze/Silver because you see the ! and you just drop a Vision Ward and Rengar is useless. But what he's about to become is just an abomination to game-balance.

EDIT: You could even perhaps ignore every suggestion above and make Red Trinket II reveal invisible units? That way you have to use Red Trinket II sparingly. Everything must have a counter. At the moment, Invisibility is sounding a bit OP.
